availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard Frederick (Hopkins County and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Hopkins County and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Hannah Armstrong Frederick. Father of Mary Frederick, Marion Frederick, Sarah C. Frederick, James Frederick, Elizabeth J. Frederick, Louisa Frederick, Jesse R. Frederick, and Richard Frederick. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 137A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 622.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 4, p. 227A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #2989.
